characters.name: George
characters.description: George is a small, quick man with defined features who takes care of Lennie and tries to keep him out of trouble.

characters.name: Lennie
characters.description: Lennie is a huge man with a shapeless face, large eyes, and a childlike demeanor who relies on George for guidance and protection.

locations.description: Soledad is a town near the Salinas River where the story begins, setting the stage for the journey of George and Lennie.
The Salinas River is a significant location where George and Lennie rest and have important conversations about their future and their dreams.
